messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The captain is sick of the faffing around on this station, do your jobs. Properly.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Research Initiatives

Cargo: Your station has been chosen for an epidemiological research project. Send us your cargo shuttle to receive your research samples.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Unidentified armed ship detected near the station.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Data theft signal detected, source registered on local gps units.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I'm gay and very very smelly bug

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The sender of the message prior is obviously over compensating for daddy issues

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that one of the station's simple animals has developed command level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: As the captain of this station, I hereby resign. I have had enough of running after Nanotrasen's slaughter house. Captain signing off, to the bar.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Central Maintenance.
